suggestions: No Warranties. The Receiving Party acknowledges that none of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives (i) makes any express or implied representation or warranty as to the completeness or accuracy of the Confidential Information, and (ii) will have any liability whatsoever to the Receiving Party or any of its Representatives relating to or arising from their review or use of the Confidential Information. This Agreement does not constitute or create any obligation of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives to provide any Confidential Information or other information to the Receiving Party or its Representatives. Further, none of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives shall have any obligation to update any Confidential Information provided to the Receiving Party and its Representatives hereunder. Nothing herein shall obligate either the Disclosing Party or the Receiving Party to proceed with any Transaction between them, and each of the Disclosing Party and the Receiving Party reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate the discussions contemplated by this Agreement.

This Agreement does not constitute or create any obligation of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives to provide any Confidential Information or other information to the Receiving Party or its Representatives. Further, none of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives shall have any obligation to update any Confidential Information provided to the Receiving Party and its Representatives hereunder.
